short_bio: I am Lutfan Haziq, turning 21 this year. I completed National Service on 25 October 2025.
After ORD, I used my available time to self-study Python and explore AI concepts (LLMs,machine learning, agentic AI, Generative AI) through beginner lessons and guidance from peers.

My interest grew through my exposure to trading/finance, where AI and machine learning are increasingly used. As a trader, I want to understand what AI can and cannot do, and why those strengths and limitations exist.

I aim to stay calm during stressful situations and disagreements because decisions made in anger are usually lower quality.
I entered NS out of shape and improved my fitness significantly through consistent effort and structured training.
